activate_election_confirmation.title: Activation of election
activate_election_confirmation.content: When activating this election, invitations to assigned tasks are sent automatically to participants.
activate_election_confirmation.sub_content: If no other election is already active, activating this election will also activate the external website.

deactivate_election_confirmation.title: Deactivation of election
deactivate_election_confirmation.content: When deactivating the election, no automatic communication including invitations to tasks can be sent.
deactivate_election_confirmation.sub_content: If no other election is already active, deactivating this election will also deactivate the external website, so no participants can handle their invitations and tasks.

delete_election_confirmation.title: Delete election
delete_election_confirmation.content: When deleting the election all information about associated tasks are also deleted. You should ensure that you have exported the information about the election that you may need later. Are you sure you want to delete?

user.help_text: When you click on OK there will be an email sent to the user with an activation code. The email will not be saved.

disclosure_statement.description:
All participants are shown the disclosure statement when they create a user.

It explains to the participants how the municipality has legal authority to process their personal data to conduct the current election.

If you want to use the participants' personal data for anything other than running the current election, you must obtain their consent. This is done by activating the declaration of consent.

declaration_of_consent.description:
All participants are shown the disclosure statement when they create a user. If you want to process the participants' personal data in addition to conducting the current election, it may be necessary to obtain their consent. If, for example, you would like to be able to contact the participants again at the next election, you must have their consent to this.

Here you can insert a declaration of consent and activate that the participants must give their consent when creating a user.

front.title: Title
front.description:
The front page is always available to users, and basically only contains the option to log in.

You can add a title and extra information to the front page if you want.

faq.description: You can activate an FAQ, where it is possible to answer frequently asked questions. When activated, it becomes visible on the external web page for participants to see.

contact_information.email_or_digital_post_header: Please fill out at least one option.
contact_information.email_or_digital_post_description: Because of GDPR-regulation you should use Digital Post. You have to fill out either link to safe Digital Post or E-mail address.
contact_information.logo_help_text: Format: SVG. Please select a horizontal version of your logo.

tokens_description.name: Full name of participant

tokens_description.contact: Link to contact page on external website

tokens_preview.name: Mads Skjern
tokens_preview.task_type_description:
Som tilforordnet hjælper du med at tage imod vælgerne, scanne deres valgkort og udlevere stemmesedler.

Du er også med til at hjælpe vælgerne med at afgive deres stemme og sikre, at stemmesedlerne kommer i valgurnerne. Sammen med andre frivillige er du med til at sikre, at det hele forløber efter reglerne, og sammen skaber vi den gode stemning på valgstederne.

Når du møder ind om morgenen, vil du få en nærmere introduktion til opgaverne. Du behøver ikke kender til reglerne eller lovgivningen på forhånd.

Hvis der opstår tvivl i løbet af dagen, er der en valgsekretær på valgstedet, som kan afklare alle spørgsmål.

communication_template_item.subject: Subject
communication_template_item.tokens_note: You can use these tokens to replace text automatically. In the list below you can see the available tokens and what they will be replaced with. Be aware that there might be situations where the tokens can’t be replaced.
communication_template_item.attach_files_hint:
Allowed file types: pdf, doc, docx, txt, odt, xls and xlsx.
Remember that the file must be web accessible!
Max 10MB.
communication_template_item.preview_description: Here you can see how the message will look to the recipient. Tokens are replaced with data from a fictitious election and do not reflect your entered data.
